c:event.name: HubOffline
c:event.description: Sent when a hub is offline for a specified measure of time.

c:parameter.name: hubAddress
c:parameter.description: The address of the hub that went offline.

c:parameter.name: lastOnlineTime
c:parameter.description: The last time this hub was online.

c:event.name: HubOnline
c:event.description: Sent when a hub comes back online after being offline for a specified measure of time.

c:parameter.name: hubAddress
c:parameter.description: The address of the hub that came back online.

c:parameter.name: onlineTime
c:parameter.description: The time this hub came back online.

c:parameter.name: disarmedBy
c:parameter.description: The address of the person who disarmed the hub while it was offline.

c:parameter.name: offlineIncident
c:parameter.description: The address of the incident that alarmed while the hub was offline.

c:event.name: DeviceOffline
c:event.description: Sent when a device is offline for a specified measure of time.

c:parameter.name: deviceAddress
c:parameter.description: The device id of the device that went offline.

c:parameter.name: lastOnlineTime
c:parameter.description: The last time this device was online.

c:event.name: DeviceOnline
c:event.description: Sent when a device comes back online after being offline for a specified measure of time.

c:parameter.name: deviceAddress
c:parameter.description: The device id of the device that went offline.

c:parameter.name: onlineTime
c:parameter.description: The time this device came back online.
